    • createProfile

      public boolean createProfile(GymOwner gymOwner) throws InvalidCredentialsException, DataEntryFailedException
      Creates a new profile for a gym owner.
      Specified by:
      createProfile in interface GymOwnerDAO
      Parameters:
      gymOwner - The GymOwner object containing profile details.
      Returns:
      true if profile creation is successful; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidCredentialsException - if the email already exists.
      DataEntryFailedException - if profile creation fails in the database.

    • registerCenter

      public boolean registerCenter(int ownerId, String centerName, String location, int slots) throws DataEntryFailedException
      Registers a new gym center under an owner.
      Specified by:
      registerCenter in interface GymOwnerDAO
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the gym owner.
      centerName - The name of the gym center.
      location - The location of the gym center.
      slots - The number of slots available at the center.
      Returns:
      true if registration is successful; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DataEntryFailedException - if data entry fails in the OwnerRequest table.

    • addSlots

      public boolean addSlots(int centerID, GymSlots slot) throws ResourceAlreadyExistsException, DataEntryFailedException
      Adds a new slot to a gym center.
      Specified by:
      addSlots in interface GymOwnerDAO
      Parameters:
      centerID - The ID of the gym center.
      slot - The GymSlots object containing slot details.
      Returns:
      true if slot addition is successful; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ResourceAlreadyExistsException - if a similar slot already exists.
      DataEntryFailedException - if slot addition fails in the database.

    • updatepwd

      public boolean updatepwd(String email, String password, String role) throws InvalidCredentialsException
      Updates the password for a specific user.
      Specified by:
      updatepwd in interface GymOwnerDAO
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user.
      password - The new password.
      role - The role of the user (e.g., gym owner).
      Returns:
      true if the password update is successful; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidCredentialsException - if the user does not exist for the given role.
